translation:
I have received your letters of the 14th and 29th of last month, and in response, I must say that while I do not fail to recognize how much Your Mercy Jaguarão Chico a bunch of papers, to send them from there to Your Mercy.

Answered on June 29, 1843. Written by Domingos José de Almeida. 

Answered on June 29, 1843.
